meanings.definition: A dark red or purple-brown color.
meanings.sent1: The artist used puce to paint the sunset.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a lovely shade of puce.
meanings.sent3: The puce walls in the room made it feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The puce of the autumn leaves was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The puce of the wine reminded her of a deep, rich plum.

meanings.sent1: The puce jumped from the dog's fur.
meanings.sent2: The puce caused the cat to scratch furiously.
meanings.sent3: The puce on the dog's back seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The puce in the house was a constant annoyance.
meanings.sent5: The puce on the carpet seemed to multiply overnight.
